annotations: Having helped develop a series of commercially successfully apps on Android I am seeking a new opportunity that will allow me to further expand on these skills Career Highlights N/A Education Qualifications Bachelors - HCM University of Natural Sciences Information Technology - Dec 2010 - Aug 2013 College - Vien Dong College Information Technology - Oct 2007 - Oct 2010 Work Experience Android Developer - Elitech Vietnam - May 2013 - Present Analyzed software requirements and technology solutions Designed and built advanced applications for the Android platform Integrated advanced features such as ecommerce social network location service Worked with APIs to connect to 3rd party APIs like weather services Created PHP Restful APIs for Android applications Worked with Google Drive API and Google App Engine push file changed notification to clients Customized camera surface processing image and sending byte data to server through socket Involved at every project phrase from concept creation to app store deployment Responsible for general maintenance of application library and debugging Tested applications on device simulators and actual devices to fine-tune product Support new members of the team providing ongoing advice and guidance Android Developer - Freelancer - Dec 2014 - Present Joined a part of call-blocking project App Monitor Pro tracking applications usage and show alert Skills Android SDK Java C/C++ C# HTML CSS SQLite MySQL AndEngine XNA Framework 4.0 Media Streaming References N/A Powered by TCPDF www.tcpdf.org
